eeshrayala bomba praharayanta goduru wi palasthina wasiyan hata deneku maranayata path wi thibe.palasthina satankaruwan samaga kala satan waladi eeshrayala sebalun dahathun deneku miya giya bawa eeshrayala hamuda prakasha karayi.shejayiya disthrikkaya ilakka kara eeshrayalaya ella kala praharaya samulaghathanayak lesayi palasthina nayakathwaya hadunwanne.ema disthrikkaya thula manushiya satan wiramayak sandaha eeshrayalaya saha hamas sanwidhanaya ekaga wu namuth eya pawathiye payaka kalayak pamanayi.payakata pasuwa nawathath wedi prahara aarambha wi thibe.keti satan wiramayata pera eeshrayala wisin nonawathwa kala thuwakku prahara ella karamin gasa thiraye wesena siyallantama pala yamata bala kala bawayi ehi sitina bibisi warthakaru pawasanne.praharayanta lakwa niwasa gananawak winashayata path wi thibe.gewi giya dina dahathuna athulatha miya giya mulu pirisa harasiya wissak dakwa ihala damamin wenath pradeshayakata ella wu praharayakin thawath palasthina wasiyan thihakata aasanna pramanayak miya gos athi bawa gasahi saukhya amathyanshaya pawasayi.

raja kumaruwaku upan wita, ema kumaru siya mawa ha piya samanga rohalen pitawa yaddi chayarupa ganena athara eewa nila washayen madhya wetha nikuth kereyi.nawatha ema raja kumaruge chayarupa nila washayen nikuth kerenne kumaruta wayasa awuruddak weddi ohu awida yanu dakwena seyaruwak lesini.ee atharamada wasaraka kalaya athulatha raja kumarakuge seyaru nila washayen rajakiya pawula wethin nikuth kerenne natha.ese wuwa kumaru thama mawupiyan ha kisiyam uthsawa awasthawakata sahabhagi weddi ho widesha sancharayaka yededdi madhyawedin kumaruge seyaru gannata ida athath eewa nila seya ru lesa salakenne natha.ema prathipaththiya kriyawata nanwenne 1970 dashakaye sitaya.

ayawaya illime wadathma bhiyajanaka saha anathuru angawana sulu ganana wanne, eja wisin afganisthanaya, irakaya, saha siriyawa aakramanaya kirimata, pulul mada peradiga saha uthuru aprikawa pura sidu karana dron yuddhayanta saha rusiyanu deshasimawan wala eja militariya wyaptha kirimata (yuropanu tharjanathmaka aarambhaya) aramudal sapayima athulath, siyaluma abhiprayan sandaha sidukarana yuddhayan kandaya wana, wideshiya hadisi meheyum (oosioo) sandaha yojitha wadikirimaya. 2019 mulya warshaye ayawaya wisin oosioo sandaha ado biliyana 69 laba di thibiyadi 2020 mulya warshaya sandaha wana illima ado biliyana 164 ka athi wishala gananak dakwa pimbi atha.
